verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2351>uproar<s%> <S%G3973>ceased<s%>, <S%G3972>Paul<s%> having sent <S%G4341>for<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> exhorted <S%G782>them<s%>, took leave of <S%G1831>them<s%>, and departed to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when he had gone <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G3313>parts<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G3870>given<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3056>exhortation<s%>, he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1671>Greece<s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> when he had <S%G4160>spent<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%> <S%G1096>there<s%>, and <S%G5259><s%> a <S%G1917>plot<s%> was laid against <S%G846>him<s%> by <S%G2453>Jews<s%> as he was <S%G3195>about<s%> to set <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4947>Syria<s%>, <S%G1096>he<s%> <S%G1106>determined<s%> to <S%G5290>return<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G4902>accompanied<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> as far <S%G891>as<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%>, <S%G4986>Sopater<s%> of <S%G961>Beroea<s%>, the son of <S%G1161>Pyrrhus<s%>; and of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians<s%>, <S%G708>Aristarchus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4580>Secundus<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1050>Gaius<s%> of <S%G1190>Derbe<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> of <S%G774>Asia<s%>, <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5161>Trophimus<s%>.
But <S%G3778>these<s%> had gone <S%G4281>before<s%>, and were <S%G3306>waiting<s%> for <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> sailed <S%G1602>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of unleavened <S%G106>bread<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%> <S%G891>in<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G3757>where<s%> we <S%G1304>tarried<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>.

And <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1161>upon<s%> the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%>, <S%G4863>when<s%> <S%G3101>we<s%> were gathered <S%G4863>together<s%> to <S%G2806>break<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>, <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1256>discoursed<s%> with <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3195>intending<s%> to <S%G1826>depart<s%> on the <S%G1887>morrow<s%>; <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3905>prolonged<s%> his <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G3317>midnight<s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G2985>lights<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the upper <S%G5253>chamber<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> we <S%G2258>were<s%> gathered <S%G4863>together<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G2376>window<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2161>Eutychus<s%>, borne <S%G2702>down<s%> with <S%G901>deep<s%> <S%G5258>sleep<s%>; and <S%G1909>as<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1256>discoursed<s%> <S%G1256>yet<s%> <S%G4119>longer<s%>, being borne <S%G2702>down<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> his <S%G5258>sleep<s%> he fell <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the third <S%G5152>story<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G2736>up<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> went <S%G2597>down<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> on <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4843>embracing<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, Make ye <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1063>ado<s%>; for <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G1161>when<s%> he was gone <S%G305>up<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G2806>broken<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1089>eaten<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> had <S%G3656>talked<s%> with them <S%G1909>a<s%> long <S%G2425>while<s%>, even <S%G891>till<s%> break of <S%G827>day<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> he <S%G1831>departed<s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G71>brought<s%> the <S%G3816>lad<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G3357>little<s%> <S%G3870>comforted<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> going <S%G4281>before<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G4143>ship<s%> set <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G789>Assos<s%>, <S%G1564>there<s%> <S%G3195>intending<s%> to <S%G353>take<s%> in <S%G3972>Paul<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2258>had<s%> he <S%G1299>appointed<s%>, <S%G3195>intending<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> to go by <S%G3978>land<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he <S%G4820>met<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G789>Assos<s%>, we <S%G353>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G353>in<s%>, and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3412>Mitylene<s%>.

And <S%G636>sailing<s%> from <S%G2547>thence<s%>, we <S%G2658>came<s%> the <S%G1966>following<s%> day over <S%G481>against<s%> <S%G5508>Chios<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G2087>next<s%> day we <S%G3846>touched<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G4544>Samos<s%>; and the day after we <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3399>Miletus<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G2919>determined<s%> to sail <S%G3896>past<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>, <S%G3704>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1096>might<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> have to spend <S%G5551>time<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> he was <S%G4692>hastening<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1415>possible<s%> for <S%G846>him<s%>, to <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4005>Pentecost<s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3399>Miletus<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>, and <S%G3333>called<s%> to him the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they were <S%G3854>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5210>Ye<s%> yourselves <S%G1987>know<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> day2250, 575 <S%G3739>that<s%> I set <S%G1910>foot<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%>, after what <S%G4459>manner<s%> I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%>,

serving <S%G1398><s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> lowliness of <S%G5012>mind<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>with<s%> <S%G1144>tears<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> with <S%G3986>trials<s%> which <S%G4819>befell<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G1917>plots<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>;

how <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G5288>shrank<s%> not from declaring unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3762>anything<s%> that was <S%G4851>profitable<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1219>publicly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2596>from<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> to <S%G3624>house<s%>,

testifying <S%G1263><s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G1722>that<s%> shall <S%G4876>befall<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G846>there<s%>:

save <S%G4133><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1263>testifieth<s%> unto me <S%G2596>in<s%> every <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2347>afflictions<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G2192>I<s%> hold <S%G3762>not<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> of any account as <S%G5093>dear<s%> unto <S%G1683>myself<s%>, <S%G5613>so<s%> that I may <S%G5048>accomplish<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1408>course<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2983>received<s%> from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, to <S%G1263>testify<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G1330>went<s%> about <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%>, <S%G2316><s%> shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G1722>I<s%> <S%G3143>testify<s%> <S%G1722>unto<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of all <S%G3956>men<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5288>I<s%> <S%G5288>shrank<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3361>from<s%> <S%G312>declaring<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G1012>counsel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Take heed4337, 3767 unto <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4168>flock<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> hath <S%G5087>made<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1985>bishops<s%>, to <S%G4165>feed<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2316>Lord<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4046>purchased<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>.

<S%G1063><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> know1492, 5124 <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G867>departing<s%> <S%G926>grievous<s%> <S%G3074>wolves<s%> shall <S%G1525>enter<s%> in <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5339>sparing<s%> the <S%G4168>flock<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G1537>among<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> own <S%G846>selves<s%> <S%G435>shall<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G450>arise<s%>, <S%G2980>speaking<s%> perverse <S%G1294>things<s%>, to draw <S%G645>away<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G1127>watch<s%> <S%G3421>ye<s%>, remembering <S%G3754>that<s%> by the space of three <S%G5148>years<s%> I <S%G3973>ceased<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G3560>admonish<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1144>tears<s%>.
And now I commend you to God, and to the word of his grace, which is able to build you up, and to give you the inheritance among all them that are sanctified.
I coveted no man's silver, or gold, or apparel.
Ye yourselves know that these hands ministered unto my necessities, and to them that were with me.
In all things I gave you an example, that so laboring ye ought to help the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, that he himself said, It is more blessed to give than to receive.
And when he had thus spoken, he kneeled down and prayed with them all.
And they all wept sore, and fell on Paul's neck and kissed him,
sorrowing most of all for the word which he had spoken, that they should behold his face no more. And they brought him on his way unto the ship.
